title: President Donald J. Trump Is Committed to Conserving and Improving America’s Environment – The White House
content:
Fact Sheets			

		Energy & Environment	

Issued on:
September 8, 2020
Every day of my presidency, we will fight for a cleaner environment and a better quality of life for every one of our great citizens.
						President Donald J. Trump					PROTECTING OUR ENVIRONMENT: President Donald J. Trump has made it a top priority to promote a clean and healthy environment for the American people.
